similar_project_experience.project_name: Phoenix-Mesa Gateway Airport Improvements
similar_project_experience.project_description: Provided field observations, on-site materials testing, sampling, and laboratory testing on over 30,000 tons of hot-mix asphalt for 5,500 linear feet of runway improvements at Phoenix-Mesa Gateway Airport. Evaluated 36 sublots over 11 days of paving with respect to FAA specifications.

similar_project_experience.project_name: KDOT, Juliette Avenue Phase I
similar_project_experience.project_description: Juliette Avenue was reconstructed from Bluemont Avenue through the intersection of Laramie Street. This project is the first of three phases that will rehabilitate the historic Juliette Avenue brick street from Bluemont to Poyntz and was funded in part by a KDOT – Transportation Alternatives (TA) Grant in the Historic Category. Pavement reconstruction reused the existing bricks in the mid-block sections, and the intersections became concrete pavement. The project also included comprehensive stormwater improvements and waterline replacement. Our team also provided construction observation and materials testing for all of Phase I.
